17#include <sys/types.h>
18
19#include <stddef.h>
20
21#include "mandoc_aux.h"
22#include "out.h"
23#include "term.h"
24
25struct tablist {
26 size_t *t; /* Allocated array of tab positions. */
27 size_t s; /* Allocated number of positions. */
28 size_t n; /* Currently used number of positions. */
29};
30
31static struct {
32 struct tablist a; /* All tab positions for lookup. */
33 struct tablist p; /* Periodic tab positions to add. */
34 size_t d; /* Default tab width in units of n. */
35} tabs;
36
37
38void
39term_tab_set(const struct termp *p, const char *arg)
40{
41 static int recording_period;
42
43 struct roffsu su;
44 struct tablist *tl;
45 size_t pos;
46 int add;
47
48 /* Special arguments: clear all tabs or switch lists. */
49
50 if (arg == NULL) {
51 tabs.a.n = tabs.p.n = 0;
52 recording_period = 0;
53 if (tabs.d == 0) {
54 a2roffsu(".8i", &su, SCALE_IN);
55 tabs.d = term_hen(p, &su);
56 }
57 return;
58 }
59 if (arg[0] == 'T' && arg[1] == '\0') {
60 recording_period = 1;
61 return;
62 }
63
64 /* Parse the sign, the number, and the unit. */
65
66 if (*arg == '+') {
67 add = 1;
68 arg++;
69 } else
70 add = 0;
71 if (a2roffsu(arg, &su, SCALE_EM) == NULL)
72 return;
73
74 /* Select the list, and extend it if it is full. */
75
76 tl = recording_period ? &tabs.p : &tabs.a;
77 if (tl->n >= tl->s) {
78 tl->s += 8;
79 tl->t = mandoc_reallocarray(tl->t, tl->s, sizeof(*tl->t));
80 }
81
82 /* Append the new position. */
83
84 pos = term_hen(p, &su);
85 tl->t[tl->n] = pos;
86 if (add && tl->n)
87 tl->t[tl->n] += tl->t[tl->n - 1];
88 tl->n++;
89}
90
91/*
92 * Simplified version without a parser,
93 * never incremental, never periodic, for use by tbl(7).
94 */
95void
96term_tab_iset(size_t inc)
97{
98 if (tabs.a.n >= tabs.a.s) {
99 tabs.a.s += 8;
100 tabs.a.t = mandoc_reallocarray(tabs.a.t, tabs.a.s,
101 sizeof(*tabs.a.t));
102 }
103 tabs.a.t[tabs.a.n++] = inc;
104}
105
106size_t
107term_tab_next(size_t prev)
108{
109 size_t i, j;
110
111 for (i = 0;; i++) {
112 if (i == tabs.a.n) {
113 if (tabs.p.n == 0)
114 return prev;
115 tabs.a.n += tabs.p.n;
116 if (tabs.a.s < tabs.a.n) {
117 tabs.a.s = tabs.a.n;
118 tabs.a.t = mandoc_reallocarray(tabs.a.t,
119 tabs.a.s, sizeof(*tabs.a.t));
120 }
121 for (j = 0; j < tabs.p.n; j++)
122 tabs.a.t[i + j] = tabs.p.t[j] +
123 (i ? tabs.a.t[i - 1] : 0);
124 }
125 if (prev < tabs.a.t[i])
126 return tabs.a.t[i];
127 }
128}
